Forbidden Knowledge

Magic & the Supernatural

The forces, systems, and artifacts that channel power beyond mortal understanding.

magic magic

Corrupted Runes

The Darkmane Elf-specific corrupted version of standard runestone practice. Draws from void energy rather than natural magical substrate. More powerful than standard runes but unstable and dangerous to practitioner. The Fallen Way.

View Entry â†’
magic magic

Holotech

The Goldhelm technological system. No magic â€” electromagnetic and photonic engineering. Deliberately designed to counter magic systems. Frada adapted and distributed it post-Golden War. Monopoly broken but Goldhelm retains highest-tier capability.

View Entry â†’
magic magic

Malefici

The internal magic system. Draws power from the practitioner's own life force â€” mana generated internally. Mastery requires will development alongside technical training. The most widely practiced formal magic system.

View Entry â†’
magic magic

Metas

The rarest ability class. Transcends normal magic law. Cannot be taught, trained, or systematically developed. Emerges through conditions that are not fully understood. Fluffy is the primary known practitioner.

View Entry â†’
magic magic

Runestones

The external inscription-based magic system. Power stored in carved runes rather than generated internally. Golems use it as their entire biology. Karthrun is the primary runestone language. Permanent and accumulative.
